title: Create shared styles package
description: Extract color definitions and render functions from TUI (internal/tui/model.go lines 208-235) to a new shared package internal/styles/styles.go. Include: status colors/icons (open/in_progress/closed/awaiting/blocked), priority colors (P1-P3), type colors (epic/bug/feature), section header style, label style, dim style.
closed_reason: Created internal/styles/styles.go with shared Catppuccin Mocha color palette and render functions
